page.title: 15 CYCLING - CALNE
page.content: I cycle to school on my bike every day. I like cycling because when you are going down hill you can really go fast but I don't like it so much when you go up long steep hils and your legs are tired, when you get out of breath and feel very hot.When you come to a steep hill you have to get off and push your bike. When I go home from school I go down Mill Street and feel the wind through my hair and buffeting my face. I go past Dixon's shop and towards Curzon Street. When I go up that hill I find it very hard because I am tired out. I usually get up from my seat and lean over the handle bars. I do like going down hill, I do not stop to free wheel, I just carry on cycling, getting faster and faster. When I go past fields with lots of daisies they just look like a green blur with white patches.
